plugins.name: eslint-plugin-import-next
plugins.description: Drop-in replacement for eslint-plugin-import. 100x faster no-cycle detection, AI-optimized fixes, zero config migration.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-react-features
plugins.description: ESLint React rules for modern react features, hooks, and patterns.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-browser-security
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin for browser applications. Detects XSS vulnerabilities, postMessage abuse, localStorage/sessionStorage/IndexedDB token exposure, cookie security issues, WebSocket security, Blob URL leaks, Service Worker risks, and CSP misconfigurations.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-react-a11y
plugins.description: React accessibility ESLint plugin with 37 LLM-optimized rules for WCAG 2.1 compliance. Provides structured error messages for AI assistants and auto-fix capabilities.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-node-security
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin for Node.js built-in modules (fs, child_process, vm, path, Buffer). Detects command injection, path traversal, code execution vulnerabilities with AI-parseable error messages.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-secure-coding
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin with 89 AI-parseable rules for detecting and preventing vulnerabilities. OWASP Top 10 2021 + Mobile Top 10 2024 coverage, CWE references, and AI-assisted fix guidance.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-vercel-ai-security
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin for Vercel AI SDK. SDK-aware rules for generateText, streamText, tools, and streaming patterns with full type knowledge.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-mongodb-security
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin for MongoDB & Mongoose. Detects NoSQL injection, operator attacks, credential exposure, and ODM-specific vulnerabilities with AI-optimized fix guidance.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-lambda-security
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin for AWS Lambda and Middy applications. Detects insecure API Gateway responses, missing security headers, CORS misconfigurations, input validation issues, and more.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-jwt
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin for JWT operations. Detects algorithm confusion (CVE-2022-23540), weak secrets, missing validation, and library-specific vulnerabilities across jsonwebtoken, jose, express-jwt, @nestjs/jwt, jwks-rsa, and jwt-decode.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-pg
plugins.description: ESLint plugin with security and best practices rules for the pg Node.js driver

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-maintainability
plugins.description: ESLint rules for reducing cognitive load and ensuring code readability.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-crypto
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin with 24 AI-parseable rules for cryptographic best practices. Detects weak algorithms, insecure key handling, CVE-specific vulnerabilities, and deprecated crypto patterns.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-express-security
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint plugin for Express.js applications. Detects insecure cookies, missing security headers, CORS misconfigurations, CSRF vulnerabilities, GraphQL security issues, and more.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-conventions
plugins.description: ESLint rules for team-specific disciplinary patterns and code conventions.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-reliability
plugins.description: ESLint rules for runtime stability, fault tolerance, and type safety.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-nestjs-security
plugins.description: Security-focused ESLint rules for NestJS applications. Detects missing guards, validation pipes, throttling, exposed sensitive fields, and more.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-operability
plugins.description: ESLint rules for production behavior, resource hygiene, and log quality.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-modularity
plugins.description: ESLint rules for architecture, DDD patterns, and module isolation with AI-parseable guidance.

plugins.name: eslint-plugin-modernization
plugins.description: ESLint rules for modernizing JavaScript to ES2022+ syntax with AI-parseable guidance.
